title: Fenton's Death
description: Emm and Francine grew up with Fenton. He was their neighbor, best friend and big brother all in one. Fenton thought he loved both his friends equally but one day as a young man he realized he had to make a choice. But what would his choice do to the 3. And then...Fenton died. Fenton's Death is a love story. You might say it is a story about a love triangle...a love triangle with a twist.
author: S. Elizabeth
